text: The Cow (, GƒÅv or Gav) is a 1969 Iranian drama movie directed by Dariush Mehrjui and was based on the novel and play by Gholam-Hossein Saedi. It stars Ezzatollah Entezami, Jamshid Mashayekhi, Ali Nassirian, Jafar Vali. ==Other websites== * Category:1969 drama movies Category:Iranian movies Category:Movies directed by Dariush Mehrjui
title: The Cow (movie)
